title: @Riot state of Malphite?
body: This dude hasn't received changes in forever, no buffs no nerfs. Is he in a perfect state of balance or do you even intend to push his power a little. Get him out of bot lane perhaps. (It feels really stupid to poke a support who will just block it with his sheild, walk away, wait for shield to respawn, then eat your poke again. Other supports don't have much damage either so breaking his shield is time-draining.)  Or maybe make his top lane stronger, or his jungle stronger? Right now he just seems in a weird state tbh, so I just wanted to know if there's anything on the table.

replies.body: I hated the change to his 'w'. I liked being able to build AD but still have good damage.
:P Well if you're building damage I think you'd be doing "good damage"

How long have you been playing this game?

He recently got his W changed as well as a new AA animation for it. Also who plays malphite support (other than the ones with kalista as the adc)? Every malphite I see plays him top lane (same for myself) 

Not sure where you've been lol he's an incredibly strong pick
